text: (dūtarē,) allāhanu nimage nim'ma kanasinalli avarannu (śatru paḍeyannu) kaḍimeyāgi kāṇisiddanu – ondu vēḷe avanu nimage, avarannu bahaḷavāgi kāṇisiddare nīvellā hin̄jariyuttiddiri mattu ā (yud'dhada) viṣayadalli bhinnamata tāḷuttiddiri. Ādare allāhanu rakṣisidanu. Khaṇḍitavāgiyū avanu manadoḷagina viṣayagaḷannū aritiruttāne
